modName: Guild Followers - Nightingale Recruit - A Simple Follower Mod
summary: This is the first part to the Guild Followers Mod Series. This Mod Series will add an NPC from each Guild in Skyrim to a random series. This one add a Nightingale Recruit in Riften by the Blacksmith. She will stay by your side with all of the Nightingale Armor and Weapons. She also comes with 9000 Steel arrows in her inventory.
descriptionHtml: This is the first part to the Guild Followers Mod Series. This Mod Series will add an NPC from each Guild in Skyrim to a random series. This one add a Nightingale Recruit in Riften by the Blacksmith. She will stay by your side with all of the Nightingale Armor and Weapons. She also comes with 9000 Steel arrows in her inventory. And also this is my first actual real follower mod. So please send in some feedback and or questions and ill answer them. So please enjoy and endorse if you want! Thanks. -Pc4life220
author: Pc4life220
